name: BLOATED
description:
Eat and drink at your own risk!

BEST PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN

Made for the BlackThornProd Game Jam.

Enter a shopping mall,  Eat and drink as much as you can, but remember to escape before the mall kicks you out!

Music made by Akamodo 

(Instagram): https://www.instagram.com/kamodohop/

Game made by Blobster Hop

(Instagram): https://www.instagram.com/colossalcalling/
